blogPost.title: How can you keep your kids from doing inappropriate things online during the school day? Answer by @RonnaGlickman, Speaker, Educator, Consultant. https://t.co/jdd79R1Dtu https://t.co/aovPguozCn
blogPost.author: Quora

localize.full_text: 如何让孩子在上学期间不在网上做不正当的事情？回答者：@RonnaGlickman，演讲者、教育家、顾问。https://t.co/jdd79R1Dtu https://t.co/aovPguozCn。
如何讓孩子在上學期間不在網上做不正當的事情？回答者：@RonnaGlickman，演講者、教育家、顧問。https://t.co/jdd79R1Dtu https://t.co/aovPguozCn。
学校の授業中に子供がネットで不適切なことをしないようにするにはどうしたらいいでしょうか？Answer by @RonnaGlickman, Speaker, Educator, Consultant. https://t.co/jdd79R1Dtu https://t.co/aovPguozCn

previous.title: How did New York City create the world's best drinking water? Answer by @LawHeller, Professor @ColumbiaLaw. https://t.co/ZaT4Qh8yCv https://t.co/XKn3UlN5yE

localize.full_text: 纽约市是如何创造出世界上最好的饮用水的？回答者：@哥伦比亚大学法学院教授LawHellerhttps://t.co/ZaT4Qh8yCv https://t.co/XKn3UlN5yE。
紐約市是如何創造出世界上最好的飲用水的？回答者：@哥倫比亞大學法學院教授LawHellerhttps://t.co/ZaT4Qh8yCv https://t.co/XKn3UlN5yE。
ニューヨーク市はどのようにして世界最高の飲料水を生み出したのか？Answer by @LawHeller, Professor @ColumbiaLaw. https://t.co/ZaT4Qh8yCv https://t.co/XKn3UlN5yE

next.title: How can women in particular overcome impostor syndrome in tech? Answer by Grace Chen, CEO and Co-founder @commonnet. https://t.co/HG2194sEe5 https://t.co/X0NCGMGkl3

localize.full_text: 尤其是女性如何克服科技界的冒牌货综合症？由CEO兼联合创始人@commonnet的Grace Chen回答。https://t.co/HG2194sEe5 https://t.co/X0NCGMGkl3。
尤其是女性如何克服科技界的冒牌貨綜合症？由CEO兼聯合創始人@commonnet的Grace Chen回答。https://t.co/HG2194sEe5 https://t.co/X0NCGMGkl3。
特に女性は、技術分野での偽者症候群をどのように克服すればよいのでしょうか？回答：Grace Chen, CEO and Co-founder @commonnet. https://t.co/HG2194sEe5 https://t.co/X0NCGMGkl3
